title: Omnicom Group 's revenue 2006 to 2018
summary: The statistic shows bechtel 's global revenue from the fiscal year of 2006 to the fiscal year of 2018 . The company generated around 25.5 billion u.s. dollars in revenue in the fiscal year of 2018 . bechtel Founded by Warren A. bechtel in 1898 , the bechtel Corporation is the largest construction and engineering company in the country and the twelfth largest construction contractor worldwide .
gold: This statistic presents the global revenue of U.S. advertising network Omnicom from 2006 to 2018 . In 2018 , the Omnicom Group generated a global revenue of 15.29 billion U.S. dollars , slight increase from 15.27 billion a year earlier . Here you can find out which of Omnicom 's operating sectors generates the most revenue .
